DOC.HEADLINE: dihydroergotamine mesylate, USP 1 mg, methanesulfonic acid/sodium hydroxide, qs to pH 3.6 ± 0. 4 6.1 % by vol. glycerin, UP 15% by wt. water for injection, USP , qs to 1 ml.
DOC.TEXT: D.H.E. 45 (dihydroergotamine mesylate) Injection, USP is indicated for the acute treatment of migraine headaches with or without aura and the acute treatment of cluster headache episodes.
